thread.title: Tfromm
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Tfromm

author: Tfromm
title: Tfromm
text: I have ordered from Country Attire for the past four years...consistently great customer service and great products. I ordered the CA Teviot wax jacket this year and was surprised to see it on my American Midwestern doorstep in little over a week. I LOVE this jacket!!!! Very well constructed, extra attention to details, fits perfectly, and very fashionable. Nice to wear something made in the UK instead of China!
